topic.title: Manga torrents
topic.body: Are there any zites with manga magnet links? We should pool our resources together to make it happen if it doesn't exist. I hate going to sites like manga now.

1_18JuREUrfUPwdwJLPA336tSjVaap8VSZp4.body:
You can delete anything on your own system.
You can choose to go to only sites with legal content.
This is exactly the same as the normal world wide web, except since there is centralized services governments can shut those down. Nobody can shut down Zeronet.

1_1L6kM35jc1KwpPi8LpEsCJmgXw2RM3UW1W.body: no girls on the zeronet. sorry.
